ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Re: Enchanters and the Charisma vs Int Battle
ygData.msgSnippet: My level 45 Enchanter has 200/193 cha/int buffed up with Charisma buff frmo 49 shaman. Otherwise I don t know how I d get the 200 cha. No planes gear, but I
ygData.messageBody:
My level 45 Enchanter has 200/193 cha/int buffed up with Charisma buff frmo
49 shaman. Otherwise I don't know how I'd get the 200 cha. No planes gear,
but I have some high end stuff ilke sarnak arcane fetish and the like.

-Dysin, Fennin Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Amy Pratt [mailto:pratts001@...]
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 9:45 PM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Re: Enchanters and the Charisma vs Int
Battle


Is it possible to get to 200 int/cha (both at the same time) before you can
get into the planes?

My level 22 enchanter is at 165 cha (which seems to be working great), but
only 143 int. She's a dark elf. Yah yah, I know. Dark elves aren't the
best choice. But I just won't play any other race of caster.

Caelrie- enchanter on Fennin Ro



> What I should of said is:
>
> If you have 200 int and 150 charisma on your enchanter. I dont
> believe it is a good investment to lower your int to gain more
> charisma since at this point and having done some tests it seems to
> me that it all pretty much works the same after 150 charisma.
> However, if you can improve it without sacrificing INT by all means
> do so. In the end, I suppose it is all a moot point if you can get
> to 200 int, 200 cha.
>
>
>
>
>
>
